name: iTunes Podcast File
summary: Learn about .PCAST files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: PCAST files can be created by selecting an iTunes podcast and dragging it to the desktop. After receiving a PCAST file, you can double-click it to automatically subscribe to the podcast. iTunes will then automatically begin downloading the latest audio files.
NOTE: Since PCAST files are stored using XML formatting, you can view them with any text editor.

description: XML file created by iTunes, a music shopping and playback program; contains information for subscribing to a podcast, including the link, title, category, and subtitle; used for sharing recommended podcasts or favorites with others over email or the Web.
